name: Scenario
description: Scenario is an AI-powered platform for creating and managing production-ready visual assets with precision and creative control.
longDescription: Scenario is an AI-driven platform designed to empower creators, from solo artists to large studios, by providing tools to train custom AI models, generate consistent visuals, and streamline creative workflows. It enables users to produce high-quality 2D images, videos, and 3D assets tailored to specific art styles or project needs. The platform integrates seamlessly into existing pipelines, offering features like real-time rendering, advanced editing, and enterprise-grade security to protect intellectual property. Scenario’s mission is to accelerate content creation while maintaining artistic vision, making it ideal for game development, marketing, and other creative industries. By combining AI automation with user control, it reduces production time and enhances efficiency. Trusted by companies like Ubisoft and Scopely, Scenario supports scalable, on-brand asset creation.
features: Train custom AI models to generate visuals aligned with specific styles or characters using 10-30 images.
Generate consistent 2D images, videos, and 3D meshes with precise control over style and output.
Edit assets with tools like inpainting, outpainting, and background removal for polished, production-ready results.
Integrate Scenario’s API into workflows for seamless asset creation in programming environments like Python or Node.
Use Scenario Live for real-time rendering, transforming sketches into fully rendered visuals instantly.
Organize assets efficiently with collections, tags, and search for streamlined project management.
Leverage enterprise-grade security with SOC2 compliance and SSO to protect intellectual property.
Generate high-resolution textures and 360-degree skyboxes for immersive game environments.
Upscale images up to 16x resolution for enhanced quality without compromising consistency.
Collaborate across teams with shared projects and role-based permissions for efficient workflows.
Access a library of foundation models like Flux and SDXL for diverse creative possibilities.
Create frame-by-frame spritesheets for game animations, such as run cycles or attacks.
Use Prompt Spark to refine prompts and eliminate guesswork in asset generation.

faqs.question: What is Scenario and what does it do?
faqs.answer: Scenario is an AI platform for generating consistent, high-quality 2D images, videos, and 3D assets, allowing users to train custom models and edit outputs for creative projects.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan available for Scenario?
faqs.answer: Yes, Scenario offers a limited free plan with 50 daily credits, suitable for testing core features before upgrading to paid plans.

faqs.question: Can I use Scenario to create assets for video games?
faqs.answer: Yes, Scenario supports game asset creation, including characters, environments, and spritesheets, integrating with engines like Unity or Unreal.

faqs.question: How long does it take to train a custom model?
faqs.answer: Training a custom model typically takes 30 minutes to a few hours, depending on the dataset size and settings.

faqs.question: Does Scenario support commercial use of generated assets?
faqs.answer: Yes, assets generated from Scenario’s public models or custom models (with proper data rights) are cleared for commercial use, subject to terms.

faqs.question: What platforms does Scenario support?
faqs.answer: Scenario is accessible via its web platform, iOS and Android apps, and API, with plugins for Unity and Discord.

faqs.question: How secure is my data on Scenario?
faqs.answer: Scenario ensures enterprise-grade security with SOC2 compliance, SSO, and private model settings to protect user data and intellectual property.

faqs.question: Can I integrate Scenario into my existing workflow?
faqs.answer: Yes, Scenario’s API and plugins allow seamless integration into existing art pipelines and development environments.

faqs.question: What types of assets can I generate with Scenario?
faqs.answer: You can generate 2D images, videos, 3D meshes, textures, skyboxes, and spritesheets for various creative applications.
